fields.headline: Snow update
fields.bodyText: Best snow of the week The peaks aren't the only things that are mammoth at Mammoth Mountain, USA; the snowfall has been pretty huge as well. The depth is 220cm on the upper slopes and 175cm further below. The temperature is -14C, with snow showers expected. Deal of the week Inghams is offering a late deal to the popular French resorts of Tignes and La Plagne, departing either 5 or 12 January for seven nights. The accommodation is allocated on arrival and is based on four or five people sharing a self-catering apartment. Flight from Gatwick to Geneva and transfer by coach or rail is included in the price of £149 + £5 supplement. Phone Inghams on 020 8780 4433. Website of the week www.1ski.com, is a British-based ski site that's perfect for new skiers. It gives an absolute beginners' guide to the best resorts, putting them into the best for après-ski, the best for scenic skiing, best value and so on. It even tells you what you can expect to spend your money on during your ski holiday. The section marked 'how to ski' gives it away as perhaps too simplistic for hardened slope animals, but it's a great place to get started.
